title: Forestry/timber trailers â€“ small
summary: Forestry/timber trailers specifically designed for use in forests and woodland to extract felled timber causing minimal disturbance to soil, flora and fauna.

eligible.eligibleBullet02: be designed for use in forests and woodland to extract felled timber.
eligible.eligibleBullet06: have low ground pressure tyres, floatation tyres or an automatic inflation and deflation system for tyres.
eligible.eligibleBullet07: have a timber carrying capacity of at least 9,000kg.
eligible.eligibleBullet08: use trailer hitch eyes to attach to a towing vehicle.
eligible.eligibleText01: Trailers using ball hitches for towing are not eligible.
